articles.author: Andrew Pulver
articles.title: Sandra Bullock's partner Bryan Randall dies aged 57 - The Guardian
articles.description: The photographer, who Bullock described as ‘the love of my life’, died after a three-year battle with ALS, the most common form of motor neurone disease
articles.content:
Bryan Randall, the longtime partner of Sandra Bullock, has died aged 57 from ALS (amyotrophic lateral sclerosis), it has been announced.
In a statement to People magazine, Randalls family said that … [+882 chars]

articles.title: Sentencing in Megan Thee Stallion shooting stretches into second day - The Guardian
articles.description: Rapper Tory Lanez was found guilty in December 2022 of shooting fellow artist and prosecutors call for 13 years in prison
articles.content:
The sentencing hearing for the musician Tory Lanez will stretch into a second day on Tuesday, as the artist was set to be sentenced for shooting the fellow artist Megan Thee Stallion in 2020.
